footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Shenhe | Update Date: 08/05/2022 | Editor: Effab1e#2963

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value: __Calamity Queller__ - Best in slot. Usually requires running ER sands.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value:
__Favonius Lance__ - Lowers both her and team's ER requirements. Best option when team wide energy is needed.

Engulfing Lightning, Vortex Vanquisher, Skyward Spine, Staff of Homa, Wavebreaker's Fin, Primordial Jade Winged Spear all serve as strong stat sticks

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% or Energy Recharge |<goblet>  ATK% or Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  ATK% or CRIT Rate/CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Spring Spirit Summoning
**2)** Elemental Burst: Divine Maiden's Deliverance
**3)** Normal Attack: Dawnstar Piercer (Not Recommended)

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Main stat choices are all similar in total damage output so it is best to use what you have.

ER requirements : 
~200% with one other Cryo
~180% with one other Cryo and Fav
~140% with two other Cryo
